articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Is Worth Starting Over Before Phantom Liberty - Kotaku
articles.description: Phantom Liberty has a lot of new story to get through, but it’s worth revisiting the old one first
articles.content: Cyberpunk 2077s Phantom Liberty expansion is nearly upon us, and developer CD Projekt Red is recommending players start the game over before jumping into it and the 2.0 update that reworks a lot of i… [+3102 chars]

articles.title: Azerbaijan halts Karabakh offensive after ceasefire deal with Armenian separatists - BBC
articles.description: Ethnic Armenian separatists agree to disband and give up their weapons as part of a ceasefire.
articles.content:
Azerbaijan's president has declared that his country's sovereignty has been restored over Nagorno-Karabakh after a 24-hour military offensive against ethnic-Armenian forces.
